about_the_game:
EXTRA 1 Vocal & Sound Collection
The official soundtrack to Aokana: Four Rhythms Across the Blue EXTRA 1!
Features the theme song, One Small Step (Vocals: KOTOKO), and the ending theme, Happy Tomorrow (Vocals: Arisaka Mashiro),
in addition to all 11 additional BGM tracks created for Aokana: Four Rhythms Across the Blue EXTRA 1.
A must-have collection of music for fans.


Track List: (Vocal songs are all full-length)
Theme Song "One Small Step"
Vocals: KOTOKO Lyrics: Kawada Mami Composition: Nakazawa Tomoyuki & Kawada Mami Arrangement: Nakazawa Tomoyuki

Ending Song "Happy Tomorrow"
Vocals: Arisaka Mashiro Lyrics: RUCCA Composition: Mori Haruki (Elements Garden) Arrangement Mori Haruki (Elements Garden)

All 11 additional BGM tracks
Music: Elements Garden

1. One Small Step
2. Happy Tomorrow
3. Ganbaru Konekosama
4. Nekojarashi!
5. Kurenazumu Machi
6. Furiaeru Kyori
7. Hazumu Frill
8. Himawari no Kaori
9. Ano Kumo no you ni
10. Minna ga Iru kara
11. Yoru no Natsuka
12. Kasaneta Yubisaki
13. Doryoku no Hate ni
14. Happy Tomorrow Title Version
